name: TruthyCalendarFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Truthy Calendar Facts for a fact”
”Alexa, ask Truthy Calendar Facts for a truthy calendar fact”
”Alexa, open Truthy Calendar Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: truthy calendar facts
des: Gives the user a random fact from among those given in Randall Munroe's xkcd #1930 (https://xkcd.com/1930/). The given facts are used under the terms of the CC BY-NC 2.5 license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/2.5/).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
